comment.author: 99646216@N00
comment._content: Very confusing having Pitlochrie in the caption and title - Pitlochrie is in Perthshire, hundreds of miles from Portpatrick.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: You're right, hockadilly.  Intent is to provide both the published title, even if inaccurate, and the correct information that is at our modern Google/Wiki fingertips.

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: The print doesn't identify Pitlochrie at all, this seems like a mistake made only in the Detroit Publishing Co. catalogue. Dunskey Castle is misspelled though.
